Mobile Applications Developer
About the Job
VTRAC Consulting Corporation
"Solutions for Growth"

Please e-mail your resume as a MS-WORD document in confidence subject Mobile Developer, JOB Number: 2543, Attention: peterc@vtrac.com or call: (416) 366-2600 x 222.

Position:  Mobile Developer
Location: Entertainment District
Position Type: Permanent
Job ID: 2543

Responsibilities:
Developing new blackberry/iPhone/Android, Windows Mobile applications
Releasing new versions of applications, as new devices are released to the market
Enhancing application performance, memory use, application size, and usability
Completing projects on time in a proper manner

Required skills and experience:
Expert in either J2Me, Object C or C++, Visual Studio, Windows Mobile 6.1 and/or 6.5, Brew or Blackberry development
Additionally experience with either Android SDK, iPhone SDK, or Palm SDK would be a bonus
Must have at least 1 year experience knowing your way around and understanding what it takes to develop applications on the following platforms:  Blackberry, iPhone, Android
Understand what it takes to develop software for devices with much more limited resources than a typical desktop. You also know how to debug on remote devices, or understand what can and can't be done remotely.
Windows Mobile: You have experience developing apps on this platform and could tell us in detail why we should use C++ or C# when creating applications for Windows Mobile.  This is not mandatory, but a plus.
Web Services: You know how to interface with various web services and understand technology like SOAP, XML-RPC, JSON, REST
C/C++: Pointers & memory management are your friends.
Ability to work independently, take action and contribute new ideas required in a diverse, fast-paced, team environment

We thank all the candidates in advance. Only those candidates that are selected for interview will be contacted. For other exciting opportunities, please visit us at www.vtrac.com .
